name: 2024 IEEE 4th International Conference on Computer Systems
content: Publication: Accepted papers will be included in ICCS 2024 Conference Proceedings, which will be archived in IEEE Xplore , and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and other indexing services. \* CCS 2024 is listed in IEEE Conference Calendar: https://conferences.ieee.org/conferences\_events/conferences/conferencedetails/62594 - All accepted papers in previous ICCS conferences have been included in IEEE Xplore, indexed by EI Compendex & Scopus.
